campaign.name: Just Crack An Egg - 2022 Instagram
campaign.description_html:
Who we are: We’ve created Scrambles and Omelet Rounds at Just Crack an Egg that just make life easier, and your mornings better. Afterall, you just have to Crack an Egg. Convenience without sacrificing a delicious taste.

Just crack an egg (😉) directly into our cup, add the pre-diced ingredients like chopped vegetables, premium meats and natural cheese, stir to scramble and pop it into the microwave. Simply heat for 50 seconds (for Omelet Rounds) and less than 2 minutes (for scramble) and enjoy!

To celebrate the convenience and quality of these products, we are looking for unique creators who want to share why they turn to JCAE in their own life. Let’s celebrate those who are a step-ahead because they have time for other things (and people) that really matter.

What we look like: 
https://docs.google.com/document/d/1Ov2uPeEG_b2jK0-fVms6VpT4q8pNN0rbVL4dVgVnP60/edit?usp=sharing

Where to find us: Find us in the egg aisle at major grocery retailers like Walmart, Kroger, and Publix as well as online through Instacart or Amazon Fresh.

USE OUR STORE LOCATOR:  https://www.justcrackanegg.net/

What we need creators to help us do: Inspire their following to try us! We know once people try us, they love us. In fact, we have the highest repeat rate of our entire category.

What we want you to say:  
- You have to try these Just Crack an Egg products!
- They’re delicious and easy.
- There are 7 delicious Just Crack an Egg Scrambles flavors.
- Just Crack an Egg Omelet Rounds are delicious mini-omelets made with whole, cage free eggs, natural cheese, premium meats and chopped vegetables.
- All you have to do is heat JCAE in microwave for 50 seconds (or 2 minutes scramble kits) and enjoy!
- High protein and low carb!
- Protein-fueled breakfast
- Economically efficient!//financially responsible meal

How we want campaign to come to life: We’d love to hear how you can envision this product in your life. How can you create content that makes your followers want to try it out for themselves? It’s our priority that content authentically fit’s your brand, feed, lifestyle, so that we can form an real connection with your audience and increase purchases. We want your unique creativity and perspective on how and why JCAE fits your life.

Sample content approaches:
- Now you have an extra few minutes with your kiddos before school because now you can spend more time with them.
- You were up late studying for midterms and JCAE is a perfect tasty morning snack that doesn’t make a mess before class.
- As a fitness fanatic now you can do some exercises while your meal is in the microwave.
- You have set a new intention and now have more time for am journaling

campaign.name: KeVita | Smarter Lemonade. Sweeter Summer.
campaign.description_html:
As a leading manufacturer of delicious probiotic sparkling beverages, KeVita believes in treating each gut equally well. KeVita makes a range of drinks, all packed with billions of live probiotics and made with a fermented water kefir culture, delivering not only refreshment and amazing taste, but also an innovative approach to gut health. It’s the drink that loves you back.
This summer, KeVita is re-imaging a familiar classic with its new line of light and refreshing Sparkling Probiotic Lemonades. Available in Classic, Peach & Blackberry, the delightfully bubbly summertime drink combines the beloved taste of lemonade with the benefits of our winning formulation.

To celebrate the launch and tell everyone about new KeVita Sparkling Probiotic Lemonades, we’re taking iconic lemonade stands on a nationwide “Smarter Lemonade. Sweeter Summer.” tour which kicks off in July. In conjunction with this in-person tour, we’re asking creators to highlight KeVita Sparkling Probiotic Lemonades to help us show people everywhere that they can still enjoy the lemonade they loved as a kid with a new twist.

campaign.name: Westrock Coffee Promotion
campaign.description_html:
Westrock Coffee began with the revitalization of a neglected coffee mill in Rwanda. What started with the hope of helping a few, now provides global export opportunities and purposeful employment to numerous friends and partners in 25 coffee growing countries around the world.

As we continue to expand our business model, we work to improve the livelihoods of our partners and deliver sustainable, high-quality coffee that you can be proud to brew, drink, and serve. Choose Westrock Coffee and join us for a Cup of Kindness.

For this campaign, create content that contributes to brand awareness, drives sales to retail partners, and represents how Westrock’s customers can feel good about the coffee they are drinking.

campaign.name: True Energy
campaign.description_html:
With an ever-expanding portfolio of ingredient-led products since 1912, Bragg is passionately focused on helping each individual eat better, feel better, and enjoy a more healthful and vibrant life. Our Apple Cider Vinegar has become a staple to many of our customers since Bragg’s start in 1912. Our founder Paul Bragg introduced the idea of wellness to the world. Carrying on his legacy for the past 65 years, his adopted daughter, Patricia Bragg has grown our specialties and preserved the high standards of Bragg.

Our NEW True Energy supplement is launching this January. This incredible supplement is packed with 6 B-Vitamins to generate energy at the cellular level with absolutely no caffeine! That means zero jitters, dependency, or insomnia. The benefits don’t end there - it’s made with our Bragg Organic Organic Apple Cider Vinegar with 750 mg of acetic acid (30x more than our competitors).

For this campaign, content creators will showcase our brand new True Energy ACV Supplements with lifestyle shots showing faces and/or product.

campaign_name: Power of a Smile - Social Content

campaign.name: Power of a Smile - Social Content
campaign.description_html:
A smile is the simplest form of optimism and has the power to change the trajectory of your day and impact others. Which is why Colgate chooses optimism! Our goal is to brighten social media news feeds by showing the power of a smile & celebrating the optimists among us. By championing optimism we will empower others to unleash the power of their smile!
 
Join the #ColgateSmileCircle, an optimistic group that shares a variety of stories ranging from simple joys of life, hardships or personal challenges, where courage and optimism were the driving force to achieving happiness or impacting someone in a positive way.
 
Tell us about a time where your smile changed someone's day. Was there a time when your personal challenges were impacted by the strength and positivity of a role model or maybe even a stranger? The stories we share will create a ripple effect and inspire the next wave of optimists to contribute their stories and join the #ColgateSmileCircle movement. Consider leaning into one of these tentpole moments: Pride Month, Back to School Month or Hispanic Heritage Month.

Who is Colgate?
 
We believe everyone deserves a future to smile about. At Colgate, we make products that promote healthy smiles. Not only because having a healthy smile is important to your overall health, but because when you have a healthy smile, you actually smile more – and that’s a powerful thing. Smiles are the simplest form of optimism, something we need now more than ever. That’s why we’re championing optimism – we are committed to creating a healthier planet and working every day to create healthy smiles for all.
 
Choosing optimism can lead to big changes, starting with a smile. It's not always easy to be an optimist, but when you make that choice it can be a powerful force for change in your life. Committed to taking care of healthy smiles for over 145 years, we’re dedicated to understanding the power of optimism changing our world for the better. Over the past year, we’ve partnered with academic thought-leaders, positive psychologists and members of the Gen Z community to reinforce the importance of choosing optimism.

campaign.name: The Innova Power of Clean Campaign

The product will be exclusive to Walmart Product Details: Powerful cleaning, strong suction, tangle-free/Whirlwind technology, 2x Dust cup, 10Ft extended reach for above floor cleaning, noise reduction technology, Big wheels for easy maneuverability, touch control on handle for easy operation

Hyatt is revamping a new platform of unique experiences exclusively offered to World of Hyatt members that have been curated to positively impact their wellbeing and help them discover new things and new parts of the world. These experiences support our member's wellbeing and are aligned with 3 different wellbeing landmarks: Feel, Fuel, Function.

For this revamp, Hyatt would like to ensure we have new photography & videography that reflects these new, unique experiences at hotels across the globe.

campaign_name: Wake Up to What’s Possible (Swirl Bread) Fall

campaign.name: Wake Up to What’s Possible (Swirl Bread) Fall
campaign.description_html:
Ever notice how the days all blend together? Maybe it’s because you’re in a routine rut. Or maybe it’s because you’re eating bland bread. Well here’s the good news: Thomas’ is on a mission to help you break free from blah at breakfast, lunch, dinner, and everywhere in-between. So grab a bag of Thomas’ baked goods and get inspired by a world of possibilities. Wake up to what’s possible.

Wake up is:
• A call to snap out of your routine
• A nod to breakfast but keeps it 'clockless'

What’s possible is:
• A way to ignite imagination
• A way to inspire routine disruption
• A way to position Thomas’ as the hero

For this campaign, you'll create custom content that shows the quality and versatility of Thomas’ Swirl Bread. Thomas' encourages you to show product with something more than just butter/cream cheese, a mix of sweet and savory recipes, and a mix of recipes that appeal to both adults and children.

campaign_name: Affordable Meals - Back to School and more!

campaign.name: Affordable Meals - Back to School and more!
campaign.description_html:
Buddig offers a variety of affordable and convenient prepackaged lunchmeats that let you make a delicious lunch without hurting your budget. With rising costs of gas, groceries, etc it’s tough to make ends meet and families have to stretch their dollars further than before., Buddig offers 2oz packages of lunchmeat that are still under $1- perfect to add some protein to any lunch.

Buddig is Always tasty and Always affordable- perfect for back 2 school. Remind consumers how tasty, convenient, and affordable Buddig is with a low cost lunch sandwich or recipe for work or school. Describe how Buddig lets you make a delicious lunch for your family without compromising on your budget, especially now that gas prices and grocery costs keep getting higher and higher.

campaign.name: Midea Bladeless Fan Campaign
campaign.description_html:
Midea is the biggest brand you’ve never heard of. Ranked #307 on Forbes’ list of Global Fortune 500 Companies in 2021, we are the largest manufacturer of appliances in the world. Now we have ambitious goals to introduce our Brand to the USA and gain market share within the Small and Major Appliance, and Air Conditioning categories.

This campaign is for promoting our new sleek and high tech Bladeless Fan. We're looking for 4 influencers to promote our new Fan to their Audiences via a timeline post and two story posts. The influencer should be involved with Interior Design, Technology, Fitness, or Young Parents. For this campaign we're hoping you can showcase the sleek look, powerful cooling features, and serene quiet of the new Midea Bladeless Fan so that you can make yourself at home.

campaign.name: Giuliana Prosecco: Signature Drinks
campaign.description_html:
Giuliana Prosecco is a fresh, modern prosecco from the heart of Veneto, Italy. This DOC sparkling wine is inspired by Giuliana Rancic, a popular TV host, designer, best-selling author, and mom. Giuliana Prosecco epitomizes attainable luxury, superbly crafted in one of Italy’s premier wine growing regions and brought to consumers at an accessible price point so they may enjoy sparkling fun during whatever moments life brings. Not only is Giuliana Prosecco great on its own, but it also works well in any kind of cocktail.
Giuliana Prosecco is fresh, fruity, and complex on the palate with notes of Golden Delicious apple, pear, and acacia blossom, followed by a light velvety body.

For this campaign, you will showcase the versatility of Giuliana Prosecco as a main ingredient in any cocktail during peak prosecco season- summertime!

campaign.name: Spicy Mayo
campaign.description_html:
Hellmann's has launched a NEW Spicy Mayonnaise!

Hellmann's Spicy Mayonnaise Dressing is proudly made with real, simple ingredients like real chili peppers, cage-free eggs, oil and vinegar. We use the finest, real ingredients in Hellmann's Spicy Mayonnaise Dressing. In fact, we use 100% cage-free eggs and are committed to 100% responsibly sourced soybean oil. Our spicy mayonnaise dressing is cholesterol free* and a good source of omega 3 ALA**, and has no artificial flavors, no trans-fat and no saturated fat.

It’s the ideal condiment for spicing up wraps, adding flavor to sandwiches, grilling juicy burgers, mixing creamy dips, and preparing fresh salads. And it comes in a convenient squeeze bottle with a precision tip that gives you complete control, making it easy to add to your favorite dishes. Hellmann's is known as Best Foods west of the Rockies.

Coming out of the past two years of Covid, we are all ready to share things up, and get out of the rut we fell in during lockdown. That is why to launch Spicy Mayo, Hellmann’s will start up some fun banter by asking consumers to share tips on how they get spicy. All submission will enter a chance to win a Spicy Treat for two on Hellmann’s – featuring an amazing night of dining!

campaign_name: Varathane Premium Fast Dry Wood Stain

campaign.name: Varathane Premium Fast Dry Wood Stain
campaign.description_html:
With over sixty years of experience under our belt, Varathane is a brand you can trust to provide you with the best products on the market.

Our innovative product line-up ensures a beautiful outcome on every project, every time. We know that sometimes you want a beautiful, deep color that looks like it took hours to create…without actually having to spend hours adding coats of stain to achieve your dream color.

Varathane Premium Fast Dry is the only stain out there that guarantees achieving the color shown on the can in one coat, and in only one hour! With a gorgeous color line-up of over 30 popular shades, Varathane Premium Fast Dry is the perfect choice to complete your project quickly and professionally.

Sicilia DOC is a consortium of Sicilian wine makers that have joined together to promote the rich history and modern approach of the region's grapes/wines. Known for being complex, yet approachable, Sicilian wine is a little known gem that pairs perfectly with a variety of foods and recipes.

For this campaign we would like you to take lifestyle photos that include yourself showcasing a galmour-ish lifestyle with wine to encourage fans to have Sicilian wine for occasions such as a dinner, summer party or even how to pair with summer food.

You can learn more about Sicilian wine here:  https://winesofsicily.com/age-gate/

campaign.name: Mealtime with Cream of Rice
campaign.description_html:
Families across America have started their mornings with Cream of Wheat since 1893. With Cream of Rice®, you get the same wholesome goodness of the breakfast you know and love, but perfect for gluten-free lifestyles. A hot delicious bowl of Cream of Rice® provides 5 essential vitamins and minerals and is an excellent source of iron. When prepared with water, Cream of Rice is a naturally fat-free, cholesterol-free, and sodium-free food. Cream of Rice is a gluten-free food.

Share how you prep your Cream of Rice to create a delicious, easy-to-prepare, and simple meal or snack for workout-prep, breakfast for yourself, or for your families/little ones.

campaign.name: CESAR Summer Vacation-Always On Program | Instagram
campaign.description_html:
The CESAR brand believes that the best life is a shared life, and that people and their dogs should always be together. The brand aims to transform mealtime into moments of shared joy by providing irresistible taste and variety all dogs will love.
Summer is here! So, whether your summer consists of a cross-country road trip or spending relaxing time with friends, the most important part is being able to share that time together with your dog.
We'd like for you showcase how you and your dog are having the best summer ever by highlighting what you’re doing together during the summer months!

campaign_name: NYC Pride - Event Capture (Kick-off party & Colleague event/march)

campaign.name: NYC Pride - Event Capture (Kick-off party & Colleague event/march)
campaign.description_html:
This is the third year of Hyatt being a platinum sponsor for NYC Pride and we want to highlight our support throughout Pride weekend.

We’re looking for an event photographer who can capture a few events for us:
- Kick-off party at Gild Hall – Friday, June 24 evening. This will include a DJ, drag queens, VIPs, and much more.
- Hyatt colleague event + marching – Sunday, June 26 afternoon. This will include 100+ Hyatt employees at Park South hotel having brunch, mingling, applying glitter and much more. We want to capture the interactions between colleagues. A couple hours later, the colleagues will be marching through the streets of NYC accompanied by a float. The float will have intermitted confetti blasts and we would love for the photographer to capture the blast, plus the colleagues walking with the float. We expect the photographer to walk with us on the parade route.

campaign.name: Get your FRISKA at Target!
campaign.description_html:
Meet FRISKA! Your new daily go-to supplement and healthy hack for everyday life. Why? Because our supplements have it all, and actually work. FRISKA will make you want to ditch your sugar filled gummies… Our capsules are packed with the good stuff - each one full of digestive enzymes for better food breakdown, probiotics for a happy belly, PLUS vitamins in a tiny easy-to-swallow pill and bonus, no sugar! We’d love for you to try us out.



Best yet - FRISKA is available at Target and because we know you love Target too, we’d love to work with you, send you free products and have you share about feeling the difference with FRISKA with your loyal followers. Since FRISKA launched at Target in October 2021 and we are looking to drive more and more brand fans there to buy. For this campaign, you will showcase three videos: FRISKA in your weekly "Target Run," just how easily FRISKA fits into your daily routine, and how FRISKA makes you feel after taking it for a few weeks.

campaign.name: method body self care
campaign.description_html:
At method products, our formulas are made with plant-based and other thoughtful ingredients, and with fresh, nature-inspired fragrances to help you step up your grooming game.

We recently introduced two items in our method body collection: lotion and aluminum-free deodorant. From GRWM to wind down moments, method body is one of the most important parts of your routine to help you prioritize self-care. Plus, our new lotion and deodorant work overtime – lotion provides 24-hour protection and deodorant provides 12-hour protection – so you feel and smell fresh around the clock.

campaign.name: True Energy
campaign.description_html:
With an ever-expanding portfolio of ingredient-led products since 1912, Bragg is passionately focused on helping each individual eat better, feel better, and enjoy a more healthful and vibrant life. Our Apple Cider Vinegar has become a staple to many of our customers since Bragg’s start in 1912. Our founder Paul Bragg introduced the idea of wellness to the world. Carrying on his legacy for the past 65 years, his adopted daughter, Patricia Bragg has grown our specialties and preserved the high standards of Bragg.

Our NEW True Energy supplement is launching this January. This incredible supplement is packed with 6 B-Vitamins to generate energy at the cellular level with absolutely no caffeine! That means zero jitters, dependency, or insomnia. The benefits don’t end there - it’s made with our Bragg Organic Organic Apple Cider Vinegar with 750 mg of acetic acid (30x more than our competitors).

For this campaign, content creators will showcase our brand new True Energy ACV Supplements with lifestyle shots showing faces and/or product.

campaign_name: Bake outside the box - cultural baking kits!

campaign.name: Bake outside the box - cultural baking kits!
campaign.description_html:
BāKIT Box is a female, minority owned specialty baking kit service, aimed at making baking easy and accessible to all levels. BāKIT Box offers customers a changing selection of culturally diverse baking recipes and delivers all the pre-measured ingredients directly to your door.

For this campaign, you will showcase the BaKIT Box experience including how easy it is to follow the recipes, the educational component of learning about culturally diverse bakes and different cuisines, and enjoying the delicious treat.
